entry.title: Unbreaking testnet4
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around the timing of scheduling a "flag day" in relation to holidays, with a consensus leaning towards avoiding holidays and considering a timeframe of one or two weeks as optimal. This decision is pertinent to members of the Google Groups "Bitcoin Development Mailing List", indicating its relevance to those involved in Bitcoin development or interested in such developments. The focus on timing underscores the importance of planning and coordination within the community, ensuring that key events or milestones are accessible and convenient for the majority of its members.
